page.title: 01Reepham.
page.content: Reepham is an old town.It is about 13 miles from Norwich.There is a market held in the square on a Wednesday morning.There are lots of shops.There are two schools,a High School and Primary School. On Wednesday evenings there is a club at the Primary school.On a Monday there is a youth club in the Town Hall.There are two churches and a chapel.The Libary opens on a Wednesday and Friday.Brownies,Girl Guides,Cubs and Scouts are also held on different days. There is a Hotel called The Brewary House which has sports facilities. Lots of activtys are held in the Town Hall such as disco's and parties. Reepham is surrounded by countryside, lots of which is for farming.Reepham is a nice place,it is quite busy.
